title: Land for sale Madiwela Sri Jayawardanapura Kotte
details:
07 perch land for sale immediately with house (with electricity water & telecom lines) in Obahena road Madiwela Sri Jayawardanapura kotte. Clear deeds, House repaired recently and very peace and calm area. Close to minister quarters, parliament, and also close to main towns around Sri Jayawardanapura area Thalawathugoda, Maharagama pitakotte Embuldeniya, Nugegoda, Nawinna, Hokandra etc;

2 million per perch and negotiable slightly
